directions: In a medium bowl, mix together deviled ham meat spread, cream cheese, creamy salad dressing, pecans, black olives, approximately 2 tablespoons reserved black olive liquid and black pepper. Form mixture into a ball. Chill in the refrigerator at least two hours.
Remove ball from refrigerator. Allow to stand at room temperature approximately 25 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can deviled ham meat spread
1/2 cup creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™
1 (2.25 ounce) can chopped black olives, liquid reserved
title: Devilish Cheese Ball
